answers.answer: Check ur blood pressure but it also sounds like a migrain
If u have high blood pressure along with it then call ur dr.
I.used to have that w my 7 y/o I even passed out a few times..my cause was my sugar and I was put on a diet of eating every 2.hours n bed rest..pray all is well w u
Blood pressure was normal but I figured it would be by now so we will see if it happens again thanks ladies
I'd let your doc know just to be safe and rule out preeclampsia.   Some pregnancies also induce migraines too. I had similar symptoms in my second pregnancy. Feel better!

question: So im 24 weeks and just had something weird thing happened and come home and looked online and got concerned. I started with blurry vision then got spots all over my eyes I couldn't see much at all then got dizzy and a headache that isn't going away. Well I read it was symptoms of preeclampsia should I be worried?
title: blurry vision?
